title: ICE / NOID
description: Noid dialogue -- happens mostly inside church.

dialogueTree.title: Noid: ""Yo, man. What's on your mind?" He..."
dialogueTree.text: "Yo, man. What's on your mind?" He drops a bolt into his toolbox.

links.title: You: "Come up with a site for a mega-long..."
links.text: Come up with a site for a mega-longwave radio antenna.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Close your eyes. Unfold your mental..."
links.text: Close your eyes. Unfold your mental map of Martinaise. It's morning. You're standing on the plaza before the Whirling-in-Rags.

links.title: Shivers: "The wind pushes a piece of tare acr..."
links.text: The wind pushes a piece of tare across the cracked tiles. From the north comes the malicious laughter of two children...

links.title: You: "Turn to face the bay."
links.text: Turn to face the bay.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Your eye follows the tiles west. Yo..."
links.text: Your eye follows the tiles west. You see a bench and a few twisted, pitiful trees. Then, just water...

links.title: Shivers: "The voice again, more urgent now: '..."
links.text: The voice again, more urgent now: 'Nay!'

links.title: Inland Empire: "Just a moment. That voice isn't hum..."
links.text: Just a moment. That voice isn't human, and it's not saying 'Nay!' -- It's saying 'N-n-n-neigh!'

links.title: Shivers: "From behind you, a low, spectral vo..."
links.text: From behind you, a low, spectral voice whispers: 'Nay.'

links.title: You: "Turn to face the apartments."
links.text: Turn to face the apartments.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Beyond the unkempt backyard rises a..."
links.text: Beyond the unkempt backyard rises a monstrous assemblage of concrete, plaster, and corrugated sheet metal...

links.title: You: "Turn to face the traffic circle."
links.text: Turn to face the traffic circle.

links.title: Conceptualization: "You turn around. The morning sun is..."
links.text: You turn around. The morning sun is blinding. You bring your hand to your brow and a great shadow materialises before you. A towering beast, frozen in mid-air...

links.title: You: ""The horseback monument.""
links.text: "The horseback monument."

links.title: Noid: ""Centaur-man is made of metal. With..."
links.text: "Centaur-man is made of metal. With the right gear we could make it work."

links.title: Egg Head: ""YEEEAGH! Connect the centaur to th..."
links.text: "YEEEAGH! Connect the centaur to the lorries, unite the whole roundabout in hard core waves!"

links.title: Noid: ""Huh. Sounds like Egg's saying you..."
links.text: "Huh. Sounds like Egg's saying you could use some spare cables to rig up the stalled motor lorries and increase the wavelength..."

links.title: Interfacing: "Effectively transforming the entire..."
links.text: Effectively transforming the entire roundabout into a single, fractal antenna.

links.title: You: ""Sounds like madness, but I think i..."
links.text: "Sounds like madness, but I think it could work."

links.title: Egg Head: ""ONE ROUNDABOUT, ONE WAVELENGTH! HA..."
links.text: "ONE ROUNDABOUT, ONE WAVELENGTH! HARD CORE!"

links.title: You: ""About time, those other antennas w..."
links.text: "About time, those other antennas were cramping my style."

links.title: Noid: ""It's gonna be the most hard core a..."
links.text: "It's gonna be the most hard core antenna in Martinaise, and probably all of Revachol West."

links.title: Egg Head: ""We have the amps, we have the cabl..."
links.text: "We have the amps, we have the cables! We're almost ready! Yeeeagh!"

links.title: Noid: ""He's right. All we're missing now..."
links.text: "He's right. All we're missing now is the transceiver itself. Soon as you find one, we'll be all set."

links.title: You: ""Where am I supposed to find a radi..."
links.text: "Where am I supposed to find a radio transceiver?"

links.title: Noid: ""I don't know. Buy one? Steal one?..."
links.text: "I don't know. Buy one? Steal one? I don't know your cop ways."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And before you ask: No, you can't..."
links.text: "And before you ask: No, you can't have the radio from my Kineema either."

links.title: You: ""You know what, Kim? I'll find an e..."
links.text: "You know what, Kim? I'll find an even *better* radio on my own."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I highly doubt that. When I crank..."
links.text: "I highly doubt that. When I crank the volume on my DynaWave, it's like you're in the front row at the National Concert Hall."

links.title: You: ""I didn't know *Speedfreaks FM* had..."
links.text: "I didn't know *Speedfreaks FM* had a concert series."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Joke all you want, detective. What..."
links.text: "Joke all you want, detective. Whatever radio you manage to scrounge up won't lay a *finger* on my set-up."

links.title: You: ""Alright, Kim, challenge accepted.""
links.text: "Alright, Kim, challenge accepted."

links.title: Noid: ""A cop-on-cop challenge, not bad. L..."
links.text: "A cop-on-cop challenge, not bad. Let's see what you come up with... Though I have to say, cop cars and lorries usually pack the best equipment in town."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "*Lorries*, huh? You could check out..."
links.text: *Lorries*, huh? You could check out the abandoned one by the roundabout...

links.title: You: ""On second thought, this is childis..."
links.text: "On second thought, this is childish. I'm just going to look for a regular radio."

links.title: Noid: "He shrugs. "It's your transmission...."
links.text: He shrugs. "It's your transmission. A regular old transceiver should work fine, it just won't be as *hard core*, you know..."

links.title: You: "(Point to Egg Head.) "Doesn't he ha..."
links.text: (Point to Egg Head.) "Doesn't he have something we could use?"

links.title: Noid: ""Can't do it. We just got this plac..."
links.text: "Can't do it. We just got this place set up. Can't go risking Egg's most important equipment..."

links.title: You: ""Do radiocomputers have transceiver..."
links.text: "Do radiocomputers have transceivers in them?"

links.title: Noid: ""Yeah, probably. Thing is you'd hav..."
links.text: "Yeah, probably. Thing is you'd have to be an engineer to get it out. I'd stick with *regular radios*, if I were you."

links.title: You: ""I think I saw a radio in that offi..."
links.text: "I think I saw a radio in that office near the harbour..."

links.title: Noid: ""Hmm, some equipment from harbour c..."
links.text: "Hmm, some equipment from harbour could work. Worth the leg-work, at least."

links.title: You: ""Do you think the pawnshop will hav..."
links.text: "Do you think the pawnshop will have one?"

links.title: Noid: ""Maybe, if you want to pay money li..."
links.text: "Maybe, if you want to pay money like some kind of... money lord. Yeah, pawnshop could have one."

links.title: You: ""Alright, I guess I need to find on..."
links.text: "Alright, I guess I need to find one of these transceivers then." (Conclude.)

links.title: Noid: ""While you're gone, me and Egg will..."
links.text: "While you're gone, me and Egg will get the rest of the gear together. Meet us back here when you've got it."

links.title: You: ""A radio transceiver. Cool. I've go..."
links.text: "A radio transceiver. Cool. I've got this. I've seen *plenty* of those lying around."

links.title: Noid: ""Exactly. You could buy one, you co..."
links.text: "Exactly. You could buy one, you could steal one..."

links.title: You: ""We shall call it: The Herald of De..."
links.text: "We shall call it: The Herald of Destruction."

links.title: Noid: ""Pretty hard core, but maybe it wou..."
links.text: "Pretty hard core, but maybe it would be better to go with something more positive?"

links.title: You: ""As long as it gets the job done, I..."
links.text: "As long as it gets the job done, I'm not interested in the details."

links.title: Noid: ""You're really going about this the..."
links.text: "You're really going about this the wrong way, then. The details are the best part."

links.title: You: ""Are you sure that's legal? I feel..."
links.text: "Are you sure that's legal? I feel like I'm going to need to apologise to someone."

links.title: Noid: ""You're a lawman, lawman. Don't *yo..."
links.text: "You're a lawman, lawman. Don't *you* get to decide what's legal and what isn't?"

links.title: You: ""That's... a very big antenna.""
links.text: "That's... a very big antenna."

links.title: Noid: ""Probably the biggest antenna in al..."
links.text: "Probably the biggest antenna in all of Revachol West." He seems very pleased with himself.

links.title: Noid: ""Which would pretty much make the w..."
links.text: "Which would pretty much make the whole roundabout one giant antenna."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Nope, nothing. The idea factory is..."
links.text: Nope, nothing. The idea factory is closed until further notice.

links.title: Noid: "The young speedfreak gives you a su..."
links.text: The young speedfreak gives you a suspicious look before returning to... whatever he was doing.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Your thinking about this has gotten..."
links.text: Your thinking about this has gotten way too rigid. Time to flip the whole *antenna paradigm* on its head.

links.title: You: ""Hear me out: What if we built the..."
links.text: "Hear me out: What if we built the antenna *underground*?"

links.title: Noid: ""Underground, huh? That *would* be..."
links.text: "Underground, huh? That *would* be pretty hard core..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It would also be incredibly stupid..."
links.text: "It would also be incredibly stupid. Detective, did you not take Elementary Radio Operations? I thought it was an RCM-wide requirement."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Underground antenna! Waves so hard..."
links.text: "Underground antenna! Waves so hard core only moles can hear them!"

links.title: Noid: ""Egg makes a good point. An undergr..."
links.text: "Egg makes a good point. An underground antenna's probably not the best way to contact your aerostatic."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Alright, brainstorming time. Rememb..."
links.text: Alright, brainstorming time. Remember, this is just the ideation phase. There are no *bad* ideas.

links.title: You: ""I've got it. Why don't we use the..."
links.text: "I've got it. Why don't we use the mast of a giant *boat*?"

links.title: Noid: ""What, are you some kind of *aquati..."
links.text: "What, are you some kind of *aquatic cop* now?"

links.title: You: ""I know the Wild Pines rep. She'll..."
links.text: "I know the Wild Pines rep. She'll lend us her boat for sure."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Something tells me Ms. Messier wou..."
links.text: "Something tells me Ms. Messier would be *less than thrilled* to hear you'd like to commandeer her boat so you can talk to a Coalition warship."

links.title: Noid: ""No way I'm getting on a boat owned..."
links.text: "No way I'm getting on a boat owned by the Wild Pines. Everything about them gives off a real *shadowy* sine."

links.title: You: ""Let's just say I have an *extremel..."
links.text: "Let's just say I have an *extremely* wealthy patron."

links.title: Noid: ""Oh, I get it. You're a *gigolo cop..."
links.text: "Oh, I get it. You're a *gigolo cop*, then. Makes sense..."

links.title: Noid: ""If that's the case, though, not su..."
links.text: "If that's the case, though, not sure I want to get mixed up in your patron's boat business."

links.title: You: ""Here's an idea: Maybe there's an a..."
links.text: "Here's an idea: Maybe there's an antenna in the harbour we could use?"

links.title: Noid: ""You want to get the Union in on th..."
links.text: "You want to get the Union in on this plan?" He gives you an incredulous look. "Is that a good idea?"

links.title: You: ""One-hundred percent. Evrart's an o..."
links.text: "One-hundred percent. Evrart's an old friend of mine."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, you two have grown *quite* cl..."
links.text: "Yes, you two have grown *quite* close over the last few days. Always doing little *errands* for each other."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm not sure I'd use the word 'fri..."
links.text: "I'm not sure I'd use the word 'friendly' to describe Mr. Claire's attitude toward us."

links.title: Noid: ""I don't trust the fat man. Gives o..."
links.text: "I don't trust the fat man. Gives off a hard core würm sine, real manipulative, if you ask me."

links.title: You: ""Hmmm, maybe not.""
links.text: "Hmmm, maybe not."

links.title: Noid: ""Didn't think so. You gotta watch o..."
links.text: "Didn't think so. You gotta watch out for those guys. Give off a real *hostile* sine, if you ask me."

links.title: Conceptualization: "This is easy. Antennas are basicall..."
links.text: This is easy. Antennas are basically just tall things, right?

links.title: You: ""We could use the steeple of *this*..."
links.text: "We could use the steeple of *this* church." (Point up.)

links.title: Noid: "The young man looks straight up, fo..."
links.text: The young man looks straight up, following the line of your finger. A frown comes over his face.

links.title: Noid: ""Not likely to work. This whole chu..."
links.text: "Not likely to work. This whole church is made from pinewood. They don't make too many pinewood antennas."

links.title: Rhetoric: "He's being uncharacteristically pol..."
links.text: He's being uncharacteristically polite. He means they don't make *any* pinewood antennas. Because it's such an obviously bad idea, you see.

links.title: You: ""Ours will be the first!""
links.text: "Ours will be the first!"

links.title: Noid: ""No, it won't be. There can't be a..."
links.text: "No, it won't be. There can't be a first of something that can't be."

links.title: You: ""Hmm, that's a good point, now that..."
links.text: "Hmm, that's a good point, now that you mention it."

links.title: Noid: "He shrugs, as though the point were..."
links.text: He shrugs, as though the point were rather obvious.

links.title: You: ""The radio relay tower is in bad sh..."
links.text: "The radio relay tower is in bad shape. I don't think we can use it to reach Archer."

links.title: Noid: ""This is a major setback. We're goi..."
links.text: "This is a major setback. We're going to have to find some *other* way to generate those mega-long waves."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Build it ourselves! We built this..."
links.text: "Build it ourselves! We built this nightclub, we can build anything!"

links.title: You: ""Wait, *could* we build a radio tra..."
links.text: "Wait, *could* we build a radio transmitter ourselves?"

links.title: Noid: ""Yeah, maybe?" The young man shrugs..."
links.text: "Yeah, maybe?" The young man shrugs. "Tech-wise, radio's not the spookiest thing around. Hard part's finding an antenna *big enough* to align with those mega-low frequencies..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""An antenna hard core enough to sha..."
links.text: "An antenna hard core enough to shake the whole world!"

links.title: Noid: ""Maybe not that big, but pretty big.""
links.text: "Maybe not that big, but pretty big."

links.title: You: ""Egg is right. There's no other way.""
links.text: "Egg is right. There's no other way."

links.title: You: ""Now that our sines are synced, can..."
links.text: "Now that our sines are synced, can you help me contact the Coalition?"

links.title: Noid: ""You sure that's a good idea? Those..."
links.text: "You sure that's a good idea? Those are some serious frequencies you want to mess with..."

links.title: Acele: ""Come on, Noid. I think we owe him.""
links.text: "Come on, Noid. I think we owe him."

links.title: Andre: ""Acele's right. He's one of us now.""
links.text: "Acele's right. He's one of us now."

links.title: Noid: ""Guess it would be pretty soft core..."
links.text: "Guess it would be pretty soft core for me to say no, wouldn't it?" He gnaws a screw thoughtfully.

links.title: You: ""Could you use your *sine-sense* to..."
links.text: "Could you use your *sine-sense* to help me contact a Coalition warship?"

links.title: Noid: ""Trying to get aligned with the Big..."
links.text: "Trying to get aligned with the Big Bad, are you?" He gnaws a screw thoughtfully. "Those are some serious frequencies you want to mess with..."

links.title: Acele: ""Come on, Noid. I think we owe him.""
links.text: "Come on, Noid. I think we owe him."

links.title: Andre: ""Acele's right. He's one of us now.""
links.text: "Acele's right. He's one of us now."

links.title: Noid: ""Yeah, alright. But if you're going..."
links.text: "Yeah, alright. But if you're going to sync up with *them*, you're gonna need a serious wave-generator of your own. You understand what I'm saying?"

links.title: You: ""What about the radio relay tower a..."
links.text: "What about the radio relay tower at Land's End? Is that serious enough?"

links.title: Noid: ""Not likely. Scoped that spot a whi..."
links.text: "Not likely. Scoped that spot a while back. It's short-wave stuff, mostly commercial. Plus it's all rusted out."

links.title: You: ""Not really, no.""
links.text: "Not really, no."

links.title: Egg Head: ""MEGA-LOW FREQUENCY! Waves so long..."
links.text: "MEGA-LOW FREQUENCY! Waves so long the ionosphere can't hold them!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not even the RCM has access to tha..."
links.text: "Not even the RCM has access to that kind of equipment. The Coalition is extremely possessive of its frequency bands."

links.title: Noid: ""There's an old radio relay tower a..."
links.text: "There's an old radio relay tower at the edge of the peninsula, right where the air waves meet the sea waves..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""TWO WAVES, ONE SHORE. WAVE LOVE. Y..."
links.text: "TWO WAVES, ONE SHORE. WAVE LOVE. YEAAAGH!"

links.title: Noid: ""You should go scope it out, see wh..."
links.text: "You should go scope it out, see what kind of condition it's in."

links.title: You: ""Wait, before I go -- where is this..."
links.text: "Wait, before I go -- where is this relay tower exactly?"

links.title: Noid: ""It's like, up from here. You just..."
links.text: "It's like, up from here. You just go outside, and then turn up."

links.title: You: ""Turn 'up'? You mean, like, north?""
links.text: "Turn 'up'? You mean, like, north?"

links.title: Noid: ""Yeah, up. Do they not teach you ab..."
links.text: "Yeah, up. Do they not teach you about maps in cop school?"

links.title: You: ""Alright, I'll check out the tower..."
links.text: "Alright, I'll check out the tower and report back." (Conclude.)

links.title: Noid: ""You do that. And let us know what..."
links.text: "You do that. And let us know what you discover."

links.title: You: ""I found a radio transceiver.""
links.text: "I found a radio transceiver."

links.title: Noid: ""So your cop ways came through agai..."
links.text: "So your cop ways came through again. Impressive. Let's see what you got."

links.title: You: ""I got this beauty down at the pawn..."
links.text: "I got this beauty down at the pawnshop." (Use the highly expensive transceiver.)

links.title: Noid: ""Didn't know cops made that kind of..."
links.text: "Didn't know cops made that kind of lucre. This is a brilliant piece of equipment. Maybe even *too* brilliant. Feels out of step with our whole operation..."

links.title: Inland Empire: "He wants to keep it at a distance...."
links.text: He wants to keep it at a distance. He's afraid of what powers are contained therein...

links.title: Noid: ""Alright, lawfarer, we're ready to..."
links.text: "Alright, lawfarer, we're ready to do this. I have to warn you, though, once we commit, there's no stopping until we've seen it *all the way through*. No pauses, no second-chances. This is our shot. You got it?"

links.title: Noid: ""So any cop-prep you've got to do,..."
links.text: "So any cop-prep you've got to do, you do it now. We'll wait if we have to."

links.title: You: ""Wait, didn't you say we need some..."
links.text: "Wait, didn't you say we need some kind of power supply?"

links.title: Noid: ""Don't sweat that. Egg found someth..."
links.text: "Don't sweat that. Egg found something down near the waterlock. Some maniac *abandoned* a perfectly good power source..."

links.title: Logic: "That 'maniac' is obviously you, whi..."
links.text: That 'maniac' is obviously you, which makes the 'power source' your half-sunken Coupris 40.

links.title: You: ""You mean the motor carriage that I..."
links.text: "You mean the motor carriage that I crashed into the bay?"

links.title: Noid: ""That explains why it was covered i..."
links.text: "That explains why it was covered in cop colours. Whole thing's totalled, but lucky for us the engine on the back is still perfectly good..."

links.title: Noid: ""All I have to do is run a cable fr..."
links.text: "All I have to do is run a cable from the engine up the centaur-man's memorial. It won't last forever, but it should buy us enough time to get you synced up with the Big Bad."

links.title: You: ""What do you mean someone *abandone..."
links.text: "What do you mean someone *abandoned* a power source?"

links.title: Noid: ""I know, it's completely mental, bu..."
links.text: "I know, it's completely mental, but someone drove a *perfectly good* Coupris MC straight into the bay. Carriage is totalled, but luckily the engine on the back is still working..."

links.title: Interfacing: "You really should look into this to..."
links.text: You really should look into this totalled MC when you have a chance. Seems important...

links.title: You: ""Ah, well as long as it works, I do..."
links.text: "Ah, well as long as it works, I don't need to know the details."

links.title: Noid: ""Right, that's your call then.""
links.text: "Right, that's your call then."

links.title: Logic: "An 'abandoned power source'? What c..."
links.text: An 'abandoned power source'? What could he be referring to?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Whatever it is, it was abandoned fo..."
links.text: Whatever it is, it was abandoned for *good* reason. Best to leave some stones unturned...

links.title: You: ""What kind of 'cop-prep' do I need..."
links.text: "What kind of 'cop-prep' do I need to do?"

links.title: Noid: ""How should I know? It's up to ever..."
links.text: "How should I know? It's up to everyone to know their own needs. Whatever keeps your *body and soul* in top working condition..."

links.title: Interfacing: "At the very least, you should make..."
links.text: At the very least, you should make sure you're wearing a good pair of gloves.

links.title: Noid: ""Personally, I'm gonna make sure I'..."
links.text: "Personally, I'm gonna make sure I've got a steady supply of PREPTIDE handy."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "*Now* he's playing your tune! Bette..."
links.text: *Now* he's playing your tune! Better make sure you're ready to blast while circuit-bending!

links.title: Electrochemistry: "But what's this? You're all out! Ma..."
links.text: But what's this? You're all out! Maybe this freak will spot you some...

links.title: Electrochemistry: "The speed is to get you through the..."
links.text: The speed is to get you through the tedious *detail-oriented* parts of the work. Maybe this freak will spot you some?

links.title: You: "(Whisper.) "Say, Noid. My PREPTIDE..."
links.text: (Whisper.) "Say, Noid. My PREPTIDE supply is a little low -- think you could *hook me up*?"

links.title: Noid: ""Here, you'll like this. It's got a..."
links.text: "Here, you'll like this. It's got a little straw and everything so you can slurp while you work."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant politely averts his..."
links.text: The lieutenant politely averts his eyes as you make a drug deal in a house of worship, but make no mistake: He's *less than thrilled* about it.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Fuck what the lieutenant thinks! We..."
links.text: Fuck what the lieutenant thinks! We're off to the races, baby!

links.title: Electrochemistry: "HEIGH-HO, HEIGH-HO, it's off to the..."
links.text: HEIGH-HO, HEIGH-HO, it's off to the races we go!

links.title: Noid: ""You'll probably wanna take a minut..."
links.text: "You'll probably wanna take a minute to get your *gear situation* sorted out."

links.title: You: "Nah, I'm good without it."
links.text: Nah, I'm good without it.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Hope you don't get any little wires..."
links.text: Hope you don't get any little wires crossed because you lost your concentration, Mr. Clean-and-Sober.

links.title: You: ""I'm ready now. Let's do this.""
links.text: "I'm ready now. Let's do this."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I should get some things in..."
links.text: "Yeah, I should get some things in order first."

links.title: Noid: ""Do what you have to do. We're not..."
links.text: "Do what you have to do. We're not going anywhere."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Hard core church! Nowhere else to..."
links.text: "Hard core church! Nowhere else to go!"

links.title: Noid: ""Like Egg said.""
links.text: "Like Egg said."

links.title: You: ""Someone was using this to coordina..."
links.text: "Someone was using this to coordinate a drug smuggling operation." (Use the highly advanced transceiver.)

links.title: Noid: ""Thought I felt a special sine comi..."
links.text: "Thought I felt a special sine coming off this one. I'll just have Egg pop in a frequency dial here, and we should be set..."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Rarely has there been a more apt pa..."
links.text: Rarely has there been a more apt pairing of man and transceiver. This is a portent of great success.

links.title: You: ""I found this in an office by the h..."
links.text: "I found this in an office by the harbour." (Use the perfectly adequate transceiver.)

links.title: Noid: ""An ordinary white-collar transceiv..."
links.text: "An ordinary white-collar transceiver joins the hard core underground. Yeah, this should do nicely..."

links.title: Interfacing: "A nice story to tell himself, but d..."
links.text: A nice story to tell himself, but don't forget, it really is just a normal, run-of-the-mill transceiver unit.

links.title: You: ""Okay, *now* I'm ready. Let's conta..."
links.text: "Okay, *now* I'm ready. Let's contact Archer."

links.title: Noid: ""Rest of the crew has got to stay h..."
links.text: "Rest of the crew has got to stay here." He gives you a solemn nod. "Can't afford to let the beat drop right as we're getting off the ground."

links.title: Egg Head: ""MUCH LOVE TO MY HARD CORE ANTENNA..."
links.text: "MUCH LOVE TO MY HARD CORE ANTENNA BROTHERS!"

links.title: Acele: ""Good luck, guys.""
links.text: "Good luck, guys."

links.title: Andre: ""Try to squeeze in a promo spot whi..."
links.text: "Try to squeeze in a promo spot while you're on-air, we've got to start putting the word out."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Back across the waterlock. At leas..."
links.text: "Back across the waterlock. At least we're getting our *exercise* in today."

links.title: Noid: ""Now give me a hand with these cabl..."
links.text: "Now give me a hand with these cables. It's a long walk to the roundabout..."

links.title: Noid: ""Now give me a hand with these cabl..."
links.text: "Now give me a hand with these cables. It's a long walk to the roundabout..."

links.title: You: ""What do you think about this churc..."
links.text: "What do you think about this church?"

links.title: Noid: ""It's a miracle of carpentry. Dead..."
links.text: "It's a miracle of carpentry. Dead bodies carved into *total* shapes. Now it can be something more." He rubs his hands together.

links.title: You: ""You say that as a carpenter yourse..."
links.text: "You say that as a carpenter yourself?"

links.title: Noid: "He shakes his head. "I don't say mu..."
links.text: He shakes his head. "I don't say much anything as a carpenter anymore. They tried to make me into a reckoner and a leveller. Made me a bit manic, y'know?"

links.title: Noid: ""I regret the time I dedicated to t..."
links.text: "I regret the time I dedicated to that profession, and that worker collective. I say things more as a member of the hard core psi-dance community these days."

links.title: You: ""You're not going to ask me how I k..."
links.text: "You're not going to ask me how I knew?"

links.title: Noid: ""Why? You're a cop. I carry carpent..."
links.text: "Why? You're a cop. I carry carpentry tools."

links.title: You: ""Understood.""
links.text: "Understood."

links.title: Noid: ""The material knowledge is mega, th..."
links.text: "The material knowledge is mega, though." He looks around the hollow hall of the church. "Guild shit. Teaches independence."

links.title: You: ""How old do you think the church is?""
links.text: "How old do you think the church is?"

links.title: Noid: ""That's right. The first settlers b..."
links.text: "That's right. The first settlers built it, plus six more like it. On the coast here. Was one of the first things they did... must've been really scared of something. But I understand..."

links.title: Noid: ""Alone on an uninhabited archipelag..."
links.text: "Alone on an uninhabited archipelago, forced to face themselves and nature. Pre-industrial quantities of solitude. The sea. Perhaps something more... fundamental."

links.title: Inland Empire: "He means something para-natural. He..."
links.text: He means something para-natural. He must...

links.title: Noid: ""I would want to build a safe place..."
links.text: "I would want to build a safe place for myself and my own as well..." His voice echoes in the wooden cavern of the church.

links.title: You: ""Something more fundamental? You me..."
links.text: "Something more fundamental? You mean the sound anomaly?"

links.title: Noid: ""Maybe." He looks up under the raft..."
links.text: "Maybe." He looks up under the rafters. "Maybe they were unable to face the nature of the world -- perishing."

links.title: You: ""Right.""
links.text: "Right."

links.title: Noid: ""People are always afraid of all so..."
links.text: "People are always afraid of all sorts of shit. They're right to be. The world is a trap..."

links.title: Noid: ""Three-hundred and twenty years. A..."
links.text: "Three-hundred and twenty years. A little more. The first settlers built it, plus six more like it. On the coast here. Was one of the first things they did, must've been really scared of something. I understand..."

links.title: You: ""What style is this church built in?""
links.text: "What style is this church built in?"

links.title: Noid: ""A cop who's into building critique..."
links.text: "A cop who's into building critique." He taps a floorboard. "Okay then. This is folk Dolorianism, lawmongerer. It's a subset of early *Dolorian* architecture."

links.title: You: ""I'm not just a cop. I'm an Art Cop.""
links.text: "I'm not just a cop. I'm an Art Cop."

links.title: Noid: ""Hard of core." He nods appreciativ..."
links.text: "Hard of core." He nods appreciatively.

links.title: You: ""Okay -- and what is Dolorian archi..."
links.text: "Okay -- and what is Dolorian architecture like?"

links.title: Noid: ""*Total*. Everything between an anc..."
links.text: "*Total*. Everything between an ancient concrete cathedral and a glass cube is Dolorianism. This is just a homespun version of it, folksy stuff, early mass production. They made thousands like this. Does that help you out?"

links.title: You: ""What would a Dolorian building loo..."
links.text: "What would a Dolorian building look like?"

links.title: Noid: ""Like that woman there," he nods to..."
links.text: "Like that woman there," he nods toward the stained glass window. "Vertical, thin, white, a false image of grandeur. The source of the system is up there, you're at the bottom. They really dug that power vertical."

links.title: Noid: ""Liked to show off large and intric..."
links.text: "Liked to show off large and intricate structures, arches, spires. Put you down with them. They were really into painting everything white too. Virginal shit, you know. Marriage shit. Virtue and tyranny."

links.title: You: ""Marriage is shit, yeah.""
links.text: "Marriage is shit, yeah."

links.title: Noid: ""Right." He takes a bolt from the t..."
links.text: "Right." He takes a bolt from the toolbox and spits on it before shining it.

links.title: You: ""Hey, marriage is great. Marriage i..."
links.text: "Hey, marriage is great. Marriage is sacred."

links.title: Noid: ""You're entitled to your wrong opin..."
links.text: "You're entitled to your wrong opinion." He inspects a pillar nearby, with a sharp gaze.

links.title: You: ""This church isn't painted white, a..."
links.text: "This church isn't painted white, as far as I can tell."

links.title: Noid: ""Stands to reason it used to be whi..."
links.text: "Stands to reason it used to be white on the outside." He peeks out of a small window in the dark. "Before the sea wind took all the paint off."

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Year after year, flake after flake,..."
links.text: Year after year, flake after flake, white washed clean, then covered in green moss...

links.title: Shivers: "Slowly peeled by the wind... Your s..."
links.text: Slowly peeled by the wind... Your skin crawls from the sensation as you look around.

links.title: Conceptualization: "It was probably white and gold, wit..."
links.text: It was probably white and gold, with light red flower motives. Part of you -- assumed to be lost to nerve damage -- knows this style to be Ubi Dolorianism.

links.title: You: ""Is there such a thing as *Ubi Dolo..."
links.text: "Is there such a thing as *Ubi Dolorianism* or did I just make that up?"

links.title: Noid: ""Good catch, Art Cop." He crosses h..."
links.text: "Good catch, Art Cop." He crosses his arms. "The herdsmen of the Ubi Sunt? islands came here on the first boats. Their flowery version of Dolorianism could be what we're standing in."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The Ubi are known for their partial..."
links.text: The Ubi are known for their partiality to socialism and sheep. They come from an island called Ubi Sunt?, drifting in the pale off the coast of Vesper. It's the only place in the world that has a question mark in its name. Things are not well there: It's an island of poverty and entroponetic collapse.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The Ubi are known for their partial..."
links.text: The Ubi are known for their partiality to socialism and sheep. They come from an island called Ubi Sunt?, the only place in the world that has a question mark in its name. There's something else important you should be able to remember about Ubi Sunt?, but all that's coming to mind is the sheep.

links.title: Noid: ""True." He crosses his arms and nod..."
links.text: "True." He crosses his arms and nods. "The herdsmen of the Ubi Sunt? islands came here on the first boats. Their version of Dolorianism could be what we're standing in..."

links.title: You: "I don't wanna sound like an art guy..."
links.text: I don't wanna sound like an art guy.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Then why do you have all this cultu..."
links.text: Then why do you have all this cultural analysis up here?

links.title: You: ""Yeah, enough architecture.""
links.text: "Yeah, enough architecture."

links.title: Noid: "The church creaks in response. The..."
links.text: The church creaks in response. The speedfreak is too busy listening to it with a suspicious expression to say anything.

links.title: You: ""What did you mean by *dead bodies*?""
links.text: "What did you mean by *dead bodies*?"

links.title: Noid: ""Dead bodies of perennial plants."..."
links.text: "Dead bodies of perennial plants." He taps on the wood. "Sigma functions have left this place. It's a good thing we came along -- the spiritual collapse has been total."

links.title: You: ""Spiritual collapse?""
links.text: "Spiritual collapse?"

links.title: Noid: ""'I saw some piglets suckling their..."
links.text: "'I saw some piglets suckling their dead mother' -- have you heard this one, cop-man?" He continues without waiting for an answer: "'After a short while they shuddered and went away.'"

links.title: Noid: ""They had sensed that she could no..."
links.text: "They had sensed that she could no longer see them and that she wasn't *like* them anymore. What they loved in their mother wasn't her body, but whatever it was that made her body live."

links.title: Noid: ""End of quote. This is a high-quali..."
links.text: "End of quote. This is a high-quality carcass." He kicks the floorboard. "The power of anodic beats and hard bass is needed to reanimate it."

links.title: You: ""First, where is that quote from?""
links.text: "First, where is that quote from?"

links.title: Noid: ""A Seraise man, who lived a long ti..."
links.text: "A Seraise man, who lived a long time ago. An ancient hard core brother."

links.title: You: ""What you're saying is: you're not..."
links.text: "What you're saying is: you're not a big fan of the innocentic system?"

links.title: Noid: ""A three-thousand-year-old tyrannic..."
links.text: "A three-thousand-year-old tyrannical regime of History, built and maintained by hundreds of generations of self-appointed *intellectuals*..." He looks around. "It's false-core."

links.title: Rhetoric: "The way he says it, the *false* in..."
links.text: The way he says it, the *false* in false-core is invested with twenty kilotons of disgust.

links.title: You: ""But you guys said the Ecclesiastes..."
links.text: "But you guys said the Ecclesiastes were all about love and hard core -- before, remember?"

links.title: Noid: ""*I* only said: *Unity*. One word...."
links.text: "*I* only said: *Unity*. One word. Figures of authority always misquote you." He points to his friends.

links.title: Noid: ""Andre doesn't care about the Eccle..."
links.text: "Andre doesn't care about the Ecclesiastes. He just wants the operation to run smoothly. And Egg is a demi-beast. You shouldn't listen to what people say, you should listen to what they are."

links.title: You: ""Then I did right not to agree with..."
links.text: "Then I did right not to agree with all that talk about the Ecclesiastes being okay with this then."

links.title: Noid: ""The Founding Party doesn't give tw..."
links.text: "The Founding Party doesn't give two shits about this place. Look around." He spreads his arms. "They do not have enough love for the *human crew* to oppose anything anymore. We're on our own."

links.title: You: ""I even agreed with you. About the..."
links.text: "I even agreed with you. About the Ecclesiastes being okay with this..."

links.title: Noid: ""But were you wrong? The Founding P..."
links.text: "But were you wrong? The Founding Party is okay with everything. Look around." He spreads his arms. "They do not have enough love for the *human crew* to oppose anything anymore. We're on our own."

links.title: Authority: "That's still a lie! RE-ASSERT YOURS..."
links.text: That's still a lie! RE-ASSERT YOURSELF.

links.title: You: ""Perfidy! You lied to me. I am *tir..."
links.text: "Perfidy! You lied to me. I am *tired* of people lying to me."

links.title: Noid: ""Well..." The young man pushes his..."
links.text: "Well..." The young man pushes his chest out, the skeleton of suspenders rattling...

links.title: Andre: ""Noid-man! Mellow out," the dancing..."
links.text: "Noid-man! Mellow out," the dancing hedgehog yelps at his friend. "Stop aggroing the law!"

links.title: Noid: "His chest returns to its normal pro..."
links.text: His chest returns to its normal proportions. "I'm sorry."

links.title: You: "That wouldn't be cool. I want to be..."
links.text: That wouldn't be cool. I want to be cool.

links.title: Authority: "Mewling wimp! Pathetic..."
links.text: Mewling wimp! Pathetic...

links.title: You: ""And you propose dance music will s..."
links.text: "And you propose dance music will supplant this system?"

links.title: Noid: ""*Anodic* dance music," he nods. "R..."
links.text: "*Anodic* dance music," he nods. "Regular dance music wasn't hard enough. And yes, I do."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You know what this kind of stuff go..."
links.text: You know what this kind of stuff goes well with?

links.title: You: ""Don't you have to be on drugs for..."
links.text: "Don't you have to be on drugs for that though?"

links.title: Noid: ""Only a little.""
links.text: "Only a little."

links.title: You: ""Cool.""
links.text: "Cool."

links.title: Noid: ""It's a necessity. All large human..."
links.text: "It's a necessity. All large human gatherings are narcotic. It's just the way of the spinal cord."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Khm," the lieutenant interjects: "..."
links.text: "Khm," the lieutenant interjects: "There is a difference between narcotics and group elation. One kills you, the other does not."

links.title: Noid: ""The supercharged humanism that the..."
links.text: "The supercharged humanism that the innocentic system has been feeding us, on giant city squares? That's not a drug? The sugar and wheat it feeds us is healthy?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Forget it." He waves his hand. "It..."
links.text: "Forget it." He waves his hand. "It would become an imbecilic discussion. You two continue. It's more *hard core* that way."

links.title: Empathy: "He does not feel left out. In fact..."
links.text: He does not feel left out. In fact he probably just wanted to say "hard core."

links.title: Rhetoric: "It *does* feel good to say it. Mayb..."
links.text: It *does* feel good to say it. Maybe the speedfreaks are on to something?

links.title: You: ""Not cool." Shake your head."
links.text: "Not cool." Shake your head.

links.title: Noid: ""All large human gatherings are nar..."
links.text: "All large human gatherings are narcotic. Ask any such undertaking in history -- this included." He nods toward a human-shaped pillar nearby. "Chemistry is true to its word."

links.title: You: "I don't need to be a narc."
links.text: I don't need to be a narc.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Your pleasure response was more lik..."
links.text: Your pleasure response was more like... just wondering if he has any?

links.title: You: ""What you're saying is: religion ha..."
links.text: "What you're saying is: religion has stopped being *hard core*?"

links.title: Noid: ""It never was. A three-thousand-yea..."
links.text: "It never was. A three-thousand-year-old regime of History, built by hundreds of generations of self-appointed *intellectuals*..." He looks around. "It's false to the core."

links.title: You: ""What exactly *are* you saying?""
links.text: "What exactly *are* you saying?"

links.title: Noid: ""This religion of History is false-..."
links.text: "This religion of History is false-core. It has collapsed."

links.title: You: ""Okay, then.""
links.text: "Okay, then."

links.title: Noid: ""Okay," he nods."
links.text: "Okay," he nods.

links.title: You: ""How do you like the glasswork?" (P..."
links.text: "How do you like the glasswork?" (Point to the stained-glass window.)

links.title: Noid: ""I don't." He looks over his should..."
links.text: "I don't." He looks over his shoulder. "Fucker giving me the evil eye."

links.title: You: ""That's Her Innocence Dolores Dei,..."
links.text: "That's Her Innocence Dolores Dei, mind your words."

links.title: Noid: ""You defend her, law-minion." He cr..."
links.text: "You defend her, law-minion." He cracks his neck. "She was a *mass murderer* -- what's up with that?"

links.title: Andre: ""Mellow, man! Mellow!" yells his fr..."
links.text: "Mellow, man! Mellow!" yells his friend. "No one's a mass murderer, this is a house of *love!*"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Mass murder on the floor!""
links.text: "Mass murder on the floor!"

links.title: You: ""I'm getting some real negative vib..."
links.text: "I'm getting some real negative vibrations from her too."

links.title: Noid: ""No wonder." He cracks his neck. "W..."
links.text: "No wonder." He cracks his neck. "We have to get rid of it. Dismantle it. Can't dance with a giant *mass murderer* lookin' at you. Not a good look for the club."

links.title: You: ""You wanted to get inside the churc..."
links.text: "You wanted to get inside the church and now you don't like the stained-glass window."

links.title: Noid: ""I didn't know it was in here." He..."
links.text: "I didn't know it was in here." He cracks his neck. "We have to get rid of it. Dismantle it. Can't dance with a giant *mass murderer* lookin' at you. Not a good look for the club."

links.title: You: ""Let's talk about that glasswork ag..."
links.text: "Let's talk about that glasswork again."

links.title: Noid: ""The mass murderer? Why?""
links.text: "The mass murderer? Why?"

links.title: You: ""But she's the innocence of humanis..."
links.text: "But she's the innocence of humanism. Humanism seems to be a pretty big deal around here."

links.title: Noid: ""Humanism leads to eating sugar and..."
links.text: "Humanism leads to eating sugar and pigs. Humanism was invented to mass produce billions of humans. Billions of humans can mass produce *hundreds* of billions of pigs."

links.title: Logic: "And many, many more tons of sugar!"
links.text: And many, many more tons of sugar!

links.title: Noid: ""She liked games. Her legacy, the t..."
links.text: "She liked games. Her legacy, the thing we're living, isn't *real* life. It's a strategy for some kind of victory. Against a long-dead opponent. But -- yo -- I'm only the Noid. What do I know?"

links.title: You: ""But she's pretty.""
links.text: "But she's pretty."

links.title: Noid: ""She invented the beauty you're fee..."
links.text: "She invented the beauty you're feeling. She and her glass-cutters and iconographers." He turns to look up at her face. "You set the standard, alright..."

links.title: Noid: ""Then you meet it. It's effective l..."
links.text: "Then you meet it. It's effective like that. But it is also very soft-of-core, that so-called 'beauty' of hers."

links.title: You: ""You're right, I like it harder-cor..."
links.text: "You're right, I like it harder-core."

links.title: Noid: ""In the true life of tomorrow, ever..."
links.text: "In the true life of tomorrow, every woman will be an innocence. They will wear neon headbands and leggings, and they will glow in the dark." His eyes smile enigmatically.

links.title: Inland Empire: "But you don't like that, you liar...."
links.text: But you don't like that, you liar. You like this one, the softness of her core is dear to you...

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Oh my living god, it's dear. Sudden..."
links.text: Oh my living god, it's dear. Suddenly you feel like you need to *plummet* into it. Look away, say something!

links.title: You: ""Then it seems I like it soft, beca..."
links.text: "Then it seems I like it soft, because..."

links.title: Noid: ""You wouldn't be the first. Million..."
links.text: "You wouldn't be the first. Millions liked her." The young man frowns, worried. "She's got those mass murderin' lips."

links.title: You: ""It's anything but *soft* core. It'..."
links.text: "It's anything but *soft* core. It's terrifying."

links.title: Noid: ""Hmh." The young man nods, he looks..."
links.text: "Hmh." The young man nods, he looks worried. "You may be on to something, copper-man. She's got those mass murderin' hips."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, but, like, who *isn't* accus..."
links.text: "Yeah, but, like, who *isn't* accused of being a mass murderer these days?"

links.title: Noid: ""*No one* says Arno van Eyck is a m..."
links.text: "*No one* says Arno van Eyck is a mass murderer. The anodic pioneer Rietveldt is not a mass murderer. He is not accused of mass murder..."

links.title: Noid: ""Likewise, no one says Germaine Egg..."
links.text: "Likewise, no one says Germaine Egg-Head or Andre are mass murderers. You can live *entirely* outside that suspicion. Billions of people go about not being guilty of mass murder." He nods up. "Just not her."

links.title: You: ""The resettlement programs were tot..."
links.text: "The resettlement programs were totally okay. I'm a big fan of resettlement programs, for some reason."

links.title: Noid: ""Are you a commie-cop?""
links.text: "Are you a commie-cop?"

links.title: You: ""I am.""
links.text: "I am."

links.title: Noid: ""Then that's why. Communism is just..."
links.text: "Then that's why. Communism is just a bloodier humanism, if you ask me. Has *her* love all over it." He nods up.

links.title: You: ""No." (Lie.)"
links.text: "No." (Lie.)

links.title: Noid: ""Hmh. Then it's inexplicable. Whate..."
links.text: "Hmh. Then it's inexplicable. Whatever." He picks up his toolbox, then puts it back down again.

links.title: You: ""I *do* feel there is something ter..."
links.text: "I *do* feel there is something terrifying about her."

links.title: Noid: ""There is. She is a party-repellent..."
links.text: "There is. She is a party-repellent and must be taken down before we can begin partying in here."

links.title: Half Light: "No, that's not it... it's something..."
links.text: No, that's not it... it's something more. Something closer to your skin...

links.title: You: ""Take her down. Crash it. Destroy t..."
links.text: "Take her down. Crash it. Destroy that window."

links.title: Noid: ""Will do." The speedfreak nods and..."
links.text: "Will do." The speedfreak nods and pets the toolbox as if it were a cat.

links.title: Andre: ""No, Noid! Stop twisting my melon,..."
links.text: "No, Noid! Stop twisting my melon, man! People are gonna love it. It'll be our *thing*..." His friend disagrees. "Plus it keeps the cold out!"

links.title: You: ""Keep it. Keep the beautiful sharp..."
links.text: "Keep it. Keep the beautiful sharp shards. Keep her long face and her hair."

links.title: Noid: "The speedfreak's eyes narrow with s..."
links.text: The speedfreak's eyes narrow with suspicion, as if he's looking at a man possessed.

links.title: Andre: ""It's not coming down. People are g..."
links.text: "It's not coming down. People are gonna love it. It'll be, like, our *thing*." His friend keeps dancing. "Plus it keeps the cold and the rain out!"

links.title: You: "Say nothing, stare grimly into the..."
links.text: Say nothing, stare grimly into the distance.

links.title: Noid: "The speedfreak looks the same way...."
links.text: The speedfreak looks the same way. It is dark there, in the back of the church. For a moment the music echoes strangely.

links.title: You: ""Isn't she supposed to be an embodi..."
links.text: "Isn't she supposed to be an embodiment of the World Spirit?"

links.title: Noid: ""The World Spirit does not have a b..."
links.text: "The World Spirit does not have a body. It has *organs*. Hard core is an organ of the world spirit." He raises his left hand.

links.title: Noid: ""This Arno van Eyck track is an org..."
links.text: "This Arno van Eyck track is an organ. The carpentry and glass-cutting that built this house are also organs. She's a thief if you ask me. An organ thief. All innocences are."

links.title: You: ""Would you say she was... you know,..."
links.text: "Would you say she was... you know, *human*?"

links.title: Noid: ""Ha!" The young man stretches his r..."
links.text: "Ha!" The young man stretches his ribcage made of suspenders. "I like this theory of yours, cop-man. This one I like..." He nods. "She was not human. Not really. She was an operator, playing life like a game..."

links.title: Noid: ""That's not the life that humans li..."
links.text: "That's not the life that humans live. She was adored. Humans aren't. I don't know about you, but they *hate* me. And they do not think I'm *innocent*, or some shit like that."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, they hate this, too." (Point..."
links.text: "Yeah, they hate this, too." (Point to yourself.)

links.title: Noid: ""Well, they *loved* her. They put a..."
links.text: "Well, they *loved* her. They put all their love in her and forgot all about the rest of us." The young man lets go of the suspenders and they hit his chest with a slap.

links.title: You: ""I don't know what you're talking a..."
links.text: "I don't know what you're talking about. I have thousands of fans. I am surrounded by love and support all the time."

links.title: Noid: ""Fame is a false existence. It does..."
links.text: "Fame is a false existence. It doesn't happen inside the *head*." He nods mysteriously, then lets go of the suspenders and they hit his chest with a slap.

links.title: You: ""Mhm, she was a player! She played..."
links.text: "Mhm, she was a player! She played us all! It's just a game to her."

links.title: Noid: ""Uhm, yes." He lets go of the suspe..."
links.text: "Uhm, yes." He lets go of the suspenders and they hit his chest with a slap.

links.title: Rhetoric: "This speedfreak does not quite unde..."
links.text: This speedfreak does not quite understand the sudden escalation of emotion in that argument, but he agrees nonetheless.

links.title: Noid: ""Ha!" The young man stretches his r..."
links.text: "Ha!" The young man stretches his ribcage made of suspenders. "I like this question, cop-man. She did not live the life of a human. She lived like someone who is playing a game. The life of an operator..."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I'm done talking about her...."
links.text: "Yeah, I'm done talking about her. I don't want to think about her anymore."

links.title: Rhetoric: "What a strange choice of words..."
links.text: What a strange choice of words...

links.title: Empathy: "Caustic, overflowing with negativit..."
links.text: Caustic, overflowing with negativity.

links.title: Volition: "That can't be healthy. What's happe..."
links.text: That can't be healthy. What's happening here? Why do you keep coming back to this window?

links.title: You: "Nothing, everything's okay."
links.text: Nothing, everything's okay.

links.title: Volition: "But it isn't. And you shouldn't com..."
links.text: But it isn't. And you shouldn't come back to this anymore. This should be the last time. Stop talking about that damn window, please.

links.title: You: "I don't know."
links.text: I don't know.

links.title: Volition: "Well -- you shouldn't. You shouldn'..."
links.text: Well -- you shouldn't. You shouldn't come back to this anymore. Stop talking about it, please.

links.title: You: "It's a nice window."
links.text: It's a nice window.

links.title: Volition: "Why do you keep saying that if it i..."
links.text: Why do you keep saying that if it isn't making you feel well? Don't come back to this anymore, stop talking about that damn window!

links.title: You: ""Alright, I'm done talking about he..."
links.text: "Alright, I'm done talking about her."

links.title: Noid: ""Okay." The young man appears const..."
links.text: "Okay." The young man appears constantly worried. It's just the way his brows are built. The worry never leaves his face.

links.title: You: ""How are you settling in?""
links.text: "How are you settling in?"

links.title: Noid: ""Hard to say, cop-man. Sines in her..."
links.text: "Hard to say, cop-man. Sines in here are distinctly *wild*. Gonna take a while before everything's properly *synced*..."

links.title: Noid: ""I did get to talk to the crab-man,..."
links.text: "I did get to talk to the crab-man, though."

links.title: You: ""You mean Tiago?""
links.text: "You mean Tiago?"

links.title: Noid: ""Anyway, he's been giving me kind o..."
links.text: "Anyway, he's been giving me kind of a *psychic rundown* of this place..."

links.title: Noid: ""Dude's seen some crazy shit. But h..."
links.text: "Dude's seen some crazy shit. But he's actually a lot like us."

links.title: You: ""You mean all his *Mother's love* s..."
links.text: "You mean all his *Mother's love* stuff isn't too *spooky* for you?"

links.title: Noid: ""Have you been listening to what Eg..."
links.text: "Have you been listening to what Egg's been saying? Love is *hard core* man, and a mother's love is the hardest core of all..."

links.title: You: ""You mean all his *sobriety* stuff..."
links.text: "You mean all his *sobriety* stuff isn't too *restrictive* for you?"

links.title: Noid: ""Talking to him, I realized that so..."
links.text: "Talking to him, I realized that sobriety can be pretty *hard core*, too. I gotta respect it..."

links.title: You: ""What do you mean?""
links.text: "What do you mean?"

links.title: Noid: ""The man picks up on stuff. And he..."
links.text: "The man picks up on stuff. And he knows *a lot* about the church. I got a lot to learn from him..."

links.title: Noid: ""Good thing you didn't squash him.""
links.text: "Good thing you didn't squash him."

links.title: You: ""The crab-man?""
links.text: "The crab-man?"

links.title: Noid: ""Yeah, you know. The guy who lives..."
links.text: "Yeah, you know. The guy who lives in the rafters, walks around upside down on the ceiling. You know, like a crab."

links.title: Logic: "You begin to wonder if this speedfr..."
links.text: You begin to wonder if this speedfreak has ever seen a crab before.

links.title: You: ""Are you sure it's a *crab* he remi..."
links.text: "Are you sure it's a *crab* he reminds you of?"

links.title: Noid: ""Of course I'm sure. What? You thin..."
links.text: "Of course I'm sure. What? You think I'm *confused*?"

links.title: You: ""Eight legs, walks upside down on t..."
links.text: "Eight legs, walks upside down on the ceiling, spins webs sometimes..."

links.title: Noid: ""Yeah, a crab.""
links.text: "Yeah, a crab."

links.title: You: ""No, you're definitely right. That'..."
links.text: "No, you're definitely right. That's entirely crab-like behaviour you're describing."

links.title: You: ""Oh, right. Crab-man, got it.""
links.text: "Oh, right. Crab-man, got it."

links.title: You: ""Let's talk about something else, N..."
links.text: "Let's talk about something else, Noid."

links.title: Noid: ""Sure." The young man cracks his kn..."
links.text: "Sure." The young man cracks his knuckles.

links.title: You: ""I wanted to talk some more about t..."
links.text: "I wanted to talk some more about this place."

links.title: Noid: ""Dead body, spirit entered. What is..."
links.text: "Dead body, spirit entered. What is there to talk of?"

links.title: You: ""What did Tiago tell you about the..."
links.text: "What did Tiago tell you about the church?"

links.title: Noid: ""The crab-man's been lurking here f..."
links.text: "The crab-man's been lurking here for a while. He's experienced things. Things that give off *bad sines*. As far as we can tell, the Ubis built this place about three hundred and twenty years ago as a sarcophagus."

links.title: You: ""Do you mean there are dead bodies..."
links.text: "Do you mean there are dead bodies here?!"

links.title: Noid: ""Not like a *literal* sarcophagus...."
links.text: "Not like a *literal* sarcophagus. I'm just being... metaphorical."

links.title: You: ""What's it for?""
links.text: "What's it for?"

links.title: Noid: ""Encasement. Confinement. Of someth..."
links.text: "Encasement. Confinement. Of something they were afraid of. Something new and unheard of on the isola." He looks up, into the darkness  beyond the beams. "I think that's what the crab-man is experiencing when he climbs around upstairs..."

links.title: Noid: ""Like, this is some old world shit..."
links.text: "Like, this is some old world shit the Ubis had heard about... and thought the best way to deal with it was to build a church. Surrounding it. To contain it."

links.title: You: ""Sounds like a job for the Remote V..."
links.text: "Sounds like a job for the Remote Viewers Division."

links.title: Noid: "The young man shrugs. "I doubt it...."
links.text: The young man shrugs. "I doubt it. I don't even think the Ubis properly understood it. What it does. But it's what this Soona person is looking for, and trying to measure." He nods toward the woman.

links.title: Noid: ""It'll be fruitless, though. She wo..."
links.text: "It'll be fruitless, though. She won't be able to measure it. People like that always want to measure everything, all those things they really can't."

links.title: Shivers: "The wood creaks as a gale blows by..."
links.text: The wood creaks as a gale blows by outside. Dust particles fall through the darkness, settling down on the age-bleached floor boards. The structure does not feel particularly durable.

links.title: You: ""This building seems... less than s..."
links.text: "This building seems... less than structurally sound."

links.title: Noid: ""No, it's pretty fucking *un*-sound..."
links.text: "No, it's pretty fucking *un*-sound if you ask me. They should have built a club for anodic music around it instead." He grins...

links.title: Noid: ""Anodic music will *definitely* con..."
links.text: "Anodic music will *definitely* contain whatever we're dealing with." His words echo in the chamber...

links.title: Noid: ""And if it *can't*, well..." He shr..."
links.text: "And if it *can't*, well..." He shrugs non-committally.

links.title: You: ""What makes you think Soona's going..."
links.text: "What makes you think Soona's going to fail?"

links.title: Noid: ""Seems to be the trend around here,..."
links.text: "Seems to be the trend around here, doesn't it? You can't measure shit like this... it's not like... with substance."

links.title: You: ""I found a Doomed Commercial Area i..."
links.text: "I found a Doomed Commercial Area in Martinaise proper. Maybe it's the same thing the Ubis were trying to contain?"

links.title: Noid: "The young man rubs his chin, in sil..."
links.text: The young man rubs his chin, in silence, then mumbles: "... like a concentric ring spreading out... the struggling villages..."

links.title: Noid: ""... and that is what caused the co..."
links.text: "... and that is what caused the communards to fail in defending the beachhead. Yeah, a lot of failure has gone down around here."

links.title: You: ""You think there's any merit to the..."
links.text: "You think there's any merit to the theory?"

links.title: Noid: "He shrugs. "I don't know. Maybe. Ma..."
links.text: He shrugs. "I don't know. Maybe. Maybe not. It's not a thing we can answer, cop-man. Even I have limits -- I'm a limited-psy person."

links.title: You: ""Now that I think of it, it doesn't..."
links.text: "Now that I think of it, it doesn't sound plausible."

links.title: You: ""Well, if it's without substance I..."
links.text: "Well, if it's without substance I guess there's nothing to worry about."

links.title: Noid: ""Maybe *you* can figure things out,..."
links.text: "Maybe *you* can figure things out, cop-man. I think we got on a good level here... the sines are syncing up well."

links.title: You: ""I don't get it, contain what exact..."
links.text: "I don't get it, contain what exactly?"

links.title: Noid: ""I dunno... and it's not something..."
links.text: "I dunno... and it's not something they properly understood either. What it does. But it's what this Soona person is looking for, and trying to measure." He nods toward the woman.

links.title: You: ""Huh, spooky. Let's talk about some..."
links.text: "Huh, spooky. Let's talk about something else."

links.title: You: ""Why are you so suspicious about ev..."
links.text: "Why are you so suspicious about everything?"

links.title: Noid: ""Suspicious people are esoteric peo..."
links.text: "Suspicious people are esoteric people. We don't go around spilling everything to Johnny Law. They don't call me Noid for nothing."

links.title: Noid: ""It took us setting out for this wh..."
links.text: "It took us setting out for this whole enterprise to get our sines synced..."

links.title: You: ""Why *are* you called Noid anyway?""
links.text: "Why *are* you called Noid anyway?"

links.title: Noid: ""It's short for *paranoid*.""
links.text: "It's short for *paranoid*."

links.title: You: ""May I ask why? What good is being..."
links.text: "May I ask why? What good is being suspicious?"

links.title: Noid: ""A reasonable question. Say, I get..."
links.text: "A reasonable question. Say, I get hurt. I want to make sure it never happens again. So I analyse the situation. Exercise caution. Caution is suspicion."

links.title: You: ""What are you suspicious of?""
links.text: "What are you suspicious of?"

links.title: Noid: ""Oh, it'd be easier to list stuff I..."
links.text: "Oh, it'd be easier to list stuff I'm not suspicious of. I'm not suspicious of sound and colour. Mechanics and chemistry also have a trueness about them. Most anything else deceives. Wants to steal your life away."

links.title: Inland Empire: "This is a good, dangerous line of q..."
links.text: This is a good, dangerous line of questioning. You should prod him on!

links.title: You: ""And what are the *most* suspicious..."
links.text: "And what are the *most* suspicious things?"

links.title: Noid: ""I don't have a top ten list of thi..."
links.text: "I don't have a top ten list of things I'm most suspicious of. But if I *had* one, the left-right complex would be number one. Number two would be their sole accomplishment -- the pig/wheat paradigm."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Something is off here... you feel l..."
links.text: Something is off here... you feel like it should be the other way around.

links.title: You: ""Does this mean you are mentally il..."
links.text: "Does this mean you are mentally ill?"

links.title: Noid: ""*Mental illness* is a term the pow..."
links.text: "*Mental illness* is a term the powers use to homogenize people. I think I don't reach mental illness. I am merely politically ill. A suspicious element."

links.title: You: ""Don't you mean the left-right *par..."
links.text: "Don't you mean the left-right *paradigm* and the pig/wheat *complex*?"

links.title: Noid: ""Nope. Politics is an inert complex..."
links.text: "Nope. Politics is an inert complex of daily corruption and inane thinkpieces. The real paradigm is economic and it concerns pig and wheat."

links.title: Noid: ""This is where the innovation happe..."
links.text: "This is where the innovation happens. It's only a theory, but I suspect they're breeding a pig/wheat hybrid. Probably in Graad."

links.title: You: ""Tell me more about the left-right..."
links.text: "Tell me more about the left-right business."

links.title: Noid: ""I prefer not to. Both ask the wron..."
links.text: "I prefer not to. Both ask the wrong questions. Any spark of light from either one is accidental. Their combined movement's only concern is producing enough pig and wheat for everyone -- the end goal of humanity..."

links.title: Noid: ""The original mistake was assuming..."
links.text: "The original mistake was assuming that words have more being than bodies. That's what led us astray, far from our true lives. But we may yet find a way back."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Whatever this *true life* is, you f..."
links.text: Whatever this *true life* is, you feel it's the real centrepiece of this mythology.

links.title: You: ""What's suspicious about the produc..."
links.text: "What's suspicious about the production of pork and wheat?"

links.title: Noid: ""It's our only shit." He shrugs. "W..."
links.text: "It's our only shit." He shrugs. "We should make better use of not being animals -- or cereal grain -- ourselves."

links.title: You: ""What's bad about cereal grain? Hav..."
links.text: "What's bad about cereal grain? Having enough food could be a precursor for greater things."

links.title: Noid: ""Yes, having food is a means to an..."
links.text: "Yes, having food is a means to an end. But the Left never talks about the end, only the means. Caps are likewise suckers, constantly sleepless in worry."

links.title: You: ""What's bad about animals? Animals..."
links.text: "What's bad about animals? Animals are cute."

links.title: Noid: ""Nothing, animals are cool guys, I..."
links.text: "Nothing, animals are cool guys, I like animals too. But that doesn't mean I have to be one myself."

links.title: You: ""Yeah. It's our only shit and we fu..."
links.text: "Yeah. It's our only shit and we fucking suck at it!"

links.title: Noid: "He gives you a long, suspicious loo..."
links.text: He gives you a long, suspicious look. "Correct."

links.title: Logic: "He can't help but doubt your sincer..."
links.text: He can't help but doubt your sincerity in this matter. There is no other way -- you are a police officer.

links.title: You: ""Don't assume I like the status quo..."
links.text: "Don't assume I like the status quo, because I'm a cop."

links.title: Noid: ""Precisely! The status quo doesn't..."
links.text: "Precisely! The status quo doesn't need to be loved."

links.title: You: "(Look him straight in the eye:) "Sh..."
links.text: (Look him straight in the eye:) "Shit, piss, cunts, dicks, f****ts! Fuck the World!"

links.title: Noid: "The young man looks startled."
links.text: The young man looks startled.

links.title: You: ""I was being sarcastic. This world..."
links.text: "I was being sarcastic. This world has its fair share of problems, but it's not like you guys are going to solve them."

links.title: Noid: ""Neither will anyone else.""
links.text: "Neither will anyone else."

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Noid: "The young man doesn't say anything..."
links.text: The young man doesn't say anything either. After a while he takes out a magnet and runs it over some nails in front of him.

links.title: You: ""Well, that was certainly stimulati..."
links.text: "Well, that was certainly stimulating. I want to ask you about something else now."

links.title: Noid: "His eyes flicker."
links.text: His eyes flicker.

links.title: You: ""Got it. Tell me something else.""
links.text: "Got it. Tell me something else."

links.title: Noid: ""Good call, not exposing yourself t..."
links.text: "Good call, not exposing yourself to stuff like that."

links.title: You: ""You mentioned *true life*. What wo..."
links.text: "You mentioned *true life*. What would that be like?"

links.title: Noid: ""A life is true if it's free from f..."
links.text: "A life is true if it's free from fear and internal division among oneself. And others -- mankind has seeds of greatness in it. A germinal will come, a return to trueness. It will be hard core."

links.title: You: ""How would you go about *returning*..."
links.text: "How would you go about *returning* to this true life?"

links.title: Noid: ""Beats and bright lights to shatter..."
links.text: "Beats and bright lights to shatter falsehoods. Nerve impulses for the collective body. We are very much alike in basic structure. A hard enough beat would awaken everyone to a truer calling -- in unity!"

links.title: Noid: "Just like that the speedfreak is ri..."
links.text: Just like that the speedfreak is right in your face, his eyes burning. His comrades look on worriedly.

links.title: Empathy: "The young man is dead serious about..."
links.text: The young man is dead serious about this.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Rejection of the right-left axis, e..."
links.text: Rejection of the right-left axis, emphasis on *unity*, appreciation of some primordial mode of being -- what does that remind you of?

links.title: You: ""Sort of like fascism then?""
links.text: "Sort of like fascism then?"

links.title: Noid: ""Nationalism, militarism, racism, a..."
links.text: "Nationalism, militarism, racism, and emphasis on a leader character are totally absent in *hard core*." The words echo through the church majestically.

links.title: You: ""Fair enough. Just making an observ..."
links.text: "Fair enough. Just making an observation."

links.title: Noid: "He picks up a wrench and scratches..."
links.text: He picks up a wrench and scratches his head with it, unaroused by fascism.

links.title: You: ""I didn't mean it as a bad thing.""
links.text: "I didn't mean it as a bad thing."

links.title: You: ""But shouldn't the ones that are mo..."
links.text: "But shouldn't the ones that are more hard core rule over the ones that are less hard core, offer them guidance?"

links.title: Noid: ""If some want to lead and others wa..."
links.text: "If some want to lead and others want to be led, I think they are welcome to it."

links.title: You: ""So you're advocating a noise-based..."
links.text: "So you're advocating a noise-based society?"

links.title: Noid: ""Many non-Occidental cultures share..."
links.text: "Many non-Occidental cultures share a beat at their heart. Thus, they are closer to true, hard core life. There's just never been enough of them, and they had to rely on some extremely basic percussion."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Lord of the western plain! It is re..."
links.text: Lord of the western plain! It is really happening, right here, the migrants are contaminating our youth!

links.title: You: ""I should have known! You're taking..."
links.text: "I should have known! You're taking after the kipts, that's why you're so wacky!"

links.title: Andre: ""Enough now, Noid, you have had eno..."
links.text: "Enough now, Noid, you have had enough fun bothering our guest with your crazy theories. Leave him alone."

links.title: Suggestion: "The one with the bleached hair is n..."
links.text: The one with the bleached hair is not really pulling rank on his friend here. He's just trying to create the impression of himself as a reasonable, moderate leader figure.

links.title: You: "No need to get over-excited about i..."
links.text: No need to get over-excited about it right now. Where were you?

links.title: Conceptualization: "Conjuring terrible visions of the f..."
links.text: Conjuring terrible visions of the future, which you apparently don't care for.

links.title: You: ""You keep mentioning *hard core*. W..."
links.text: "You keep mentioning *hard core*. What does it mean to you?"

links.title: Noid: ""Utmost dedication. Thoughts from t..."
links.text: "Utmost dedication. Thoughts from the spinal cord. It's a potent superlative as well."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The term also signifies certain var..."
links.text: The term also signifies certain varieties of pornography that depict penetration, just so you know.

links.title: Noid: ""Egg Head actually has a better con..."
links.text: "Egg Head actually has a better concept of the hard core. He just really likes saying 'hard core'."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Hard core!" His friend shouts from..."
links.text: "Hard core!" His friend shouts from behind his mix table, with a smile surpassing your own in wideness, a total moon-face, and eyes full of naive wonderment.

links.title: You: ""The term *hard core* also denotes..."
links.text: "The term *hard core* also denotes a strain of pornography that depicts penetration, did you know that?"

links.title: Noid: ""That's a pretty hard core coincide..."
links.text: "That's a pretty hard core coincidence, don't you think?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Yeah!""
links.text: "Yeah!"

links.title: You: ""That was vague. Dedication, someth..."
links.text: "That was vague. Dedication, something else, superlative..."

links.title: Noid: ""Maybe you're being too specific ab..."
links.text: "Maybe you're being too specific about it. Try consulting with your spinal cord."

links.title: You: ""Thank you for clearing that up.""
links.text: "Thank you for clearing that up."

links.title: Noid: ""Happy to help.""
links.text: "Happy to help."

links.title: You: ""Let's change the subject."
links.text: "Let's change the subject.

links.title: Noid: ""Oh yeah. Sure thing.""
links.text: "Oh yeah. Sure thing."

links.title: You: ""Good to know. Tell me something el..."
links.text: "Good to know. Tell me something else."

links.title: Noid: ""I would much rather tell you about..."
links.text: "I would much rather tell you about true life than this pathetic *something else*, but you are, after all, the law of the land."

links.title: You: ""What's with the clothes?""
links.text: "What's with the clothes?"

links.title: Noid: "He shrugs. "They're hard core.""
links.text: He shrugs. "They're hard core."

links.title: You: ""You look like a woman with those e..."
links.text: "You look like a woman with those earrings."

links.title: Noid: ""You know what I think? I think *ma..."
links.text: "You know what I think? I think *man*, *woman*, and *child* are arbitrary divisions which serve to bind humanity to serfdom."

links.title: You: ""That's it?""
links.text: "That's it?"

links.title: Noid: ""They're just clothes.""
links.text: "They're just clothes."

links.title: You: ""Are they? They look outlandish.""
links.text: "Are they? They look outlandish."

links.title: Noid: ""No, these are just boring, normal,..."
links.text: "No, these are just boring, normal, hard core clothes. That..." he points to your necktie, "*that's* outlandish."

links.title: You: ""It's my friend and accomplice. It..."
links.text: "It's my friend and accomplice. It makes me party harder."

links.title: Noid: ""I can see that. And you've partied..."
links.text: "I can see that. And you've partied *very* hard for a *very* long time, haven't you?"

links.title: You: "(Look at your tie suspiciously.) "W..."
links.text: (Look at your tie suspiciously.) "What's so outlandish about it?"

links.title: Noid: ""It looks like you're trying to han..."
links.text: "It looks like you're trying to hang yourself with it. So large, too. So many different patterns. It's crazy man, I like it."

links.title: Empathy: "You suddenly realize the patience a..."
links.text: You suddenly realize the patience and respect this speedfreak has shown you is partly because of your *style*. He's probably not like that with everyone.

links.title: Egg Head: ""RESPECT TO THE MAN!""
links.text: "RESPECT TO THE MAN!"

links.title: Noid: ""It's just a style, you know? Norma..."
links.text: "It's just a style, you know? Normal hard style. Anyone can wear it."

links.title: You: ""I thought there would be more to i..."
links.text: "I thought there would be more to it."

links.title: Noid: ""No, it's just a vest of suspenders..."
links.text: "No, it's just a vest of suspenders made to resemble a human rib cage. Plus some lady-clothes to piss off the sex-system." He points to your tie. "Now tell me about that hard core necktie. It's fucking primal."

links.title: You: "(Look at your tie suspiciously.) "W..."
links.text: (Look at your tie suspiciously.) "What's so hard core about it?"

links.title: You: ""Okay then.""
links.text: "Okay then."

links.title: Noid: ""It's just a style, you know?""
links.text: "It's just a style, you know?"

links.title: You: "Internalize the hard core aesthetic..."
links.text: Internalize the hard core aesthetic. Don't just nod along, really *feel* it.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Dedicated. Hyperactive. Unified. Yo..."
links.text: Dedicated. Hyperactive. Unified. You will have to add something of your own to understand this list of loosely formed qualities called hard core. You need your own entry. Make it!

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Test your limits. Surpass them. Dan..."
links.text: Test your limits. Surpass them. Dance till you drop. Dance till you die, if you must.

links.title: Authority: "This is for your posse. They got to..."
links.text: This is for your posse. They got to keep it up. They got to move. You are the major mic enforcer.

links.title: Logic: "Jumping around, as this sort of mus..."
links.text: Jumping around, as this sort of music requires, is actually a taxing physical activity and should be dignified with a sports suit.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Overwhelm them with moves. Try to h..."
links.text: Overwhelm them with moves. Try to have the most moves going on.

links.title: You: "Hard people. Hard republic. Hard ce..."
links.text: Hard people. Hard republic. Hard cell. Hard party. Hard riot. Hard government. Core membership. Core secretary. Core teachings. Core fighters.
