links.title: Conceptualization: "Predictable, but solid."
links.text: Predictable, but solid.

links.title: You: "This is taking place in Revachol, h..."
links.text: This is taking place in Revachol, hard core rising. It could only happen here, in the bottom of the geopolitical abyss. Those are the warhorns of today. We'll be given a fresh start.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Oh yeah it feels manly. Beautiful."
links.text: Oh yeah it feels manly. Beautiful.

links.title: You: "Long live the world that gave shape..."
links.text: Long live the world that gave shape to hard core to complete itself! A true heir to Dolorian values. Three-and-a-half centuries and the gift still keeps on giving.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Endless are the wonders borne out o..."
links.text: Endless are the wonders borne out of the cultural collaboration so wisely facilitated by the free world!

links.title: You: "I've got the money, I've got the pl..."
links.text: I've got the money, I've got the place/ You've got the figure, you've got the face/ Let's get together, we're jumping all over the world!

links.title: Conceptualization: "JUMPING ALL OVER THE WORLD!"
links.text: JUMPING ALL OVER THE WORLD!

links.title: You: "I am going to truly wreck myself as..."
links.text: I am going to truly wreck myself as a machine of modern party in a final showdown between flesh and spirit!

links.title: Conceptualization: "That's a good way to go."
links.text: That's a good way to go.

links.title: You: "I am the law."
links.text: I am the law.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Start the war (Hey! Hey!) Hit the f..."
links.text: Start the war (Hey! Hey!) Hit the floor! (Hey! Hey! ) We need more (Hey! Hey!) Army of hard core! Yea.

links.title: You: "I'm thinking of wearing sports appa..."
links.text: I'm thinking of wearing sports apparel as my hard core getup to maximize the mobility of limbs.

links.title: Conceptualization: "You might as well make it complete..."
links.text: You might as well make it complete with a whistle, then.

links.title: You: "I want to have fuck with you."
links.text: I want to have fuck with you.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Say that again?"
links.text: Say that again?

links.title: You: "I want to have fuck with you!"
links.text: I want to have fuck with you!

links.title: Conceptualization: "You know it, baby!"
links.text: You know it, baby!

links.title: You: "Thinking of cornering the moves mar..."
links.text: Thinking of cornering the moves market. They won't know what hit 'em.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Yeah, you should even try to put mo..."
links.text: Yeah, you should even try to put moves inside your moves.

links.title: You: "SEE THE SUNSHINE/ WE AIN'T STOPPING..."
links.text: SEE THE SUNSHINE/ WE AIN'T STOPPING/ KEEP ON DANCING/ TILL THE WORLD ENDS!

links.title: Conceptualization: "IF YOU FEAR IT, LET IT HAPPEN. KEE..."
links.text:
IF YOU FEAR IT, LET IT HAPPEN.
KEEP ON DANCING TILL THE WORLD ENDS.

links.title: You: "You know it feels unfair, there's a..."
links.text: You know it feels unfair, there's a party everywhere.

links.title: Conceptualization: "That level of conceptual thinking i..."
links.text: That level of conceptual thinking is not part of your skill set.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Your conceptualization accepts this..."
links.text: Your conceptualization accepts this in solemn admiration and gratitude.

links.title: You: "I don't seem to have anything to ad..."
links.text: I don't seem to have anything to add to the core.

links.title: Conceptualization: "So you've come empty-handed and pur..."
links.text: So you've come empty-handed and pure, without burdens. A hard-core supplicant. That will have to do.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Aggressive. Monotonous... but also..."
links.text: Aggressive. Monotonous... but also somehow sacral. Primitive, yet futuristic, like a machine man. Nothing exists, but the here and now. All are one, one purpose... All you've managed is a list. The parts don't form a whole.

links.title: You: ""Take care, Noid." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Take care, Noid." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Noid: ""You got us in, cop. I can't believ..."
dialogueTree.text: "You got us in, cop. I can't believe you got us in..." He looks around the hall, examining the carpentry.

links.title: Empathy: "With wonder in his sharp eyes."
links.text: With wonder in his sharp eyes.

links.title: Noid: ""Between you and me -- I don't know..."
links.text: "Between you and me -- I don't know if you've noticed this about me... I'm a little *suspicious* of authority. But you -- you really came through for the hard core underground."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. You really came through. For..."
links.text: "Yes. You really came through. For the hard core underground." He spreads his arms, looking around at the speedfreaks setting up shop. "How come?"

links.title: Andre: "The would-be leader is cutting some..."
links.text: The would-be leader is cutting some futuristic shapes on the floor, sweating profusely.

links.title: Acele: "Acele using her contact mic to list..."
links.text: Acele using her contact mic to listen to a tree, underwater.

links.title: Egg Head: "The one with the large head is blas..."
links.text: The one with the large head is blasting the dance track on repeat, while the stained glass window behind him is rattling from the bass.

links.title: Drama: "Sire, the tent -- 'twas a *securiti..."
links.text: Sire, the tent -- 'twas a *securitie risk*! And in here? Sanctuary! 'Twas only noble of you.

links.title: You: ""These kids got spunk. I admire tha..."
links.text: "These kids got spunk. I admire that."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay." The lieutenant keeps it lac..."
links.text: "Okay." The lieutenant keeps it laconic.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "What he means is: You can't possibl..."
links.text: What he means is: You can't possibly have handed them this real estate for such a flimsy reason -- then again, whatever keeps your nose out of the bottle and on the job.

links.title: You: ""Better here than in that tent." (S..."
links.text: "Better here than in that tent." (Shrug.) "It wasn't safe."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay." The lieutenant keeps it lac..."
links.text: "Okay." The lieutenant keeps it laconic.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "What he means is: You're right, act..."
links.text: What he means is: You're right, actually. The tent was a safety hazard and this place was deserted anyway.

links.title: You: ""I'm genuinely into the *hard core..."
links.text: "I'm genuinely into the *hard core lifestyle*. You wouldn't understand."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay." The lieutenant keeps it lac..."
links.text: "Okay." The lieutenant keeps it laconic.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "What he means is: You're right. I d..."
links.text: What he means is: You're right. I do not understand. Do whatever you have to do to keep your nose out of the bottle.

links.title: You: ""I'm a corrupt cop, Kim. This is a..."
links.text: "I'm a corrupt cop, Kim. This is a corrupt scheme."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay." The lieutenant keeps it lac..."
links.text: "Okay." The lieutenant keeps it laconic.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "What he means is: I don't care if y..."
links.text: What he means is: I don't care if you have a corrupt scheme, almost everyone does. Whatever keeps you sober and concentrated on work.

links.title: You: ""I did it for mankind. For *all of..."
links.text: "I did it for mankind. For *all of mankind*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay." The lieutenant keeps it lac..."
links.text: "Okay." The lieutenant keeps it laconic.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "What he means is: I don't believe y..."
links.text: What he means is: I don't believe you actually think you did it for all mankind. But whatever keeps you in high spirits is okay by him.

links.title: Andre: "Andre is busy cutting some slightly..."
links.text: Andre is busy cutting some slightly less lame, but still quite ungainly shapes on the church floor, sweating profusely.

links.title: You: ""That's me. A friend and an ally to..."
links.text: "That's me. A friend and an ally to the hard core underground. Have a moment to talk?"

links.title: Noid: "He nods: "What's on your mind?""
links.text: He nods: "What's on your mind?"

links.title: You: ""Cool. You're Noid right? Do you ha..."
links.text: "Cool. You're Noid right? Do you have a moment to talk?"

links.title: You: ""My dedication to the hard core und..."
links.text: "My dedication to the hard core underground is tenuous at best. I have questions, however."

links.title: Noid: ""What's on your mind?" He looks up..."
links.text: "What's on your mind?" He looks up into the darkness under the roof.

links.title: You: ""Mega. I'll be going now." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Mega. I'll be going now." [Leave.]

links.title: Noid: "The young man gives you an uncharac..."
links.text: The young man gives you an uncharacteristic smile as you're turning to leave.

dialogueTree.title: Noid: ""Huh, I see you're here again, off-..."
dialogueTree.text: "Huh, I see you're here again, off-sine-man." He rummages through his tools. "Did I mention getting us into the church would help?"

links.title: You: ""'Sine'?""
links.text: "'Sine'?"

links.title: Noid: ""Yeah. Gotta compare, see if we can..."
links.text: "Yeah. Gotta compare, see if we can align."

links.title: You: ""Interesting.""
links.text: "Interesting."

links.title: Noid: ""I suck at socializing, man. Even n..."
links.text: "I suck at socializing, man. Even now our sine synchronization is way off. But I'll see what I can do." He continues to rearrange his tools.

links.title: You: ""That's ridiculous.""
links.text: "That's ridiculous."

links.title: Noid: ""See? Our sines are way off." He lo..."
links.text: "See? Our sines are way off." He looks down at his tools. "I can already tell this social relationship is gonna take a lot of work."

links.title: You: ""But I thought we'd be okay now --..."
links.text: "But I thought we'd be okay now -- sine-wise."

links.title: Noid: ""I'm doing what I can." He continue..."
links.text: "I'm doing what I can." He continues to rearrange his tools.

links.title: Empathy: "It's not easy for him. It probably..."
links.text: It's not easy for him. It probably took him years to get used to Andre.

links.title: Rhetoric: "He looks like a *well thought out*..."
links.text: He looks like a *well thought out* individual. The synchronization might be worth it. In the long run.

links.title: You: ""What about now? Are the sines all..."
links.text: "What about now? Are the sines all right now?"

links.title: Noid: ""Na... huh. Still strongly out of s..."
links.text: "Na... huh. Still strongly out of sync. Stage gamma dis-alignment."

links.title: You: ""What?""
links.text: "What?"

links.title: Noid: ""You heard me." He examines the sma..."
links.text: "You heard me." He examines the small metal bolt in his hand.

links.title: You: ""I saw a sticker on the padlock. Ca..."
links.text: "I saw a sticker on the padlock. Can you tell me anything about it?"

links.title: Noid: ""A sticker... you mean the yellow o..."
links.text: "A sticker... you mean the yellow one? Can you describe it to me?"

links.title: Conceptualization: "Interesting. He wants you to *descr..."
links.text: Interesting. He wants you to *describe* it, though he already knows what it looks like.

links.title: You: ""Why describe it, if you already kn..."
links.text: "Why describe it, if you already know what I mean?

links.title: Noid: ""So I can hear you do it. Sometimes..."
links.text: "So I can hear you do it. Sometimes the outside gaze helps us reflect on things."

links.title: Andre: ""Noid, don't bother our guest with..."
links.text: "Noid, don't bother our guest with your games."

links.title: Noid: ""Piss off, Andre, me and Mr. Cop ar..."
links.text: "Piss off, Andre, me and Mr. Cop are trying to discuss art."

links.title: Andre: ""You shouldn't talk like that.""
links.text: "You shouldn't talk like that."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, you should be more respectfu..."
links.text: "Yeah, you should be more respectful."

links.title: Noid: ""Right, noted, sorry. Anyway, what..."
links.text: "Right, noted, sorry. Anyway, what was it like?"

links.title: Empathy: "An off-handed *sorry* if there ever..."
links.text: An off-handed *sorry* if there ever was one.

links.title: You: "Produce your ledger and show him th..."
links.text: Produce your ledger and show him the sticker.

links.title: You: "Produce your ledger and show him th..."
links.text: Produce your ledger and show him the sticker.

links.title: You: ""I'm not telling. Let me ask you so..."
links.text: "I'm not telling. Let me ask you something else."

links.title: Noid: ""C'mon. Okay, then." He looks surpr..."
links.text: "C'mon. Okay, then." He looks surprised and a bit disappointed. "You don't have to describe it. What did you want to know about the sticker?"

links.title: You: ""I don't mind a little foul languag..."
links.text: "I don't mind a little foul language here and there."

links.title: Noid: ""Cool. The ban on foulness, that's..."
links.text: "Cool. The ban on foulness, that's the moralists' plot to alienate us from our bodily functions so they can control us more fully..."

links.title: Noid: ""Anyhow, what was the sticker like?""
links.text: "Anyhow, what was the sticker like?"

links.title: You: ""I mean this one." (Show the sticke..."
links.text: "I mean this one." (Show the sticker on your ledger.)

links.title: Noid: ""Oh wow! Right on your cop ledger!..."
links.text: "Oh wow! Right on your cop ledger! You like it?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah, it's cool.""
links.text: "Yeah, it's cool."

links.title: Noid: ""It is cool. But it's also more tha..."
links.text: "It is cool. But it's also more than that. *Much* more."

links.title: Composure: "Noid is a bit disappointed it's *ju..."
links.text: Noid is a bit disappointed it's *just* cool.

links.title: You: ""It's super stupid, that's what it..."
links.text: "It's super stupid, that's what it is. I think it reminded me of myself."

links.title: Noid: ""Hey, it kind of *does* look like y..."
links.text: "Hey, it kind of *does* look like you." He thinks for a moment. "Surely a sign of things to come. What did you want to ask about it?"

links.title: You: ""It's very modern. I'd like to lear..."
links.text: "It's very modern. I'd like to learn more about it."

links.title: Noid: ""You're right, it's the harbinger o..."
links.text: "You're right, it's the harbinger of a new era. What would you like to know?"

links.title: You: ""It's this one, are you familiar wi..."
links.text: "It's this one, are you familiar with it?" (Show him the sticker inside the ledger.)

links.title: Noid: ""Seems like my creation has found i..."
links.text: "Seems like my creation has found its way into the legal bureaucracy. What did you want to ask about it?"

links.title: You: ""What's it supposed to be?""
links.text: "What's it supposed to be?"

links.title: Noid: ""A dead guy smiling.""
links.text: "A dead guy smiling."

links.title: You: ""Really?""
links.text: "Really?"

links.title: Noid: ""Really.""
links.text: "Really."

links.title: You: ""Why do you think that's so?""
links.text: "Why do you think that's so?"

links.title: Noid: ""We are all the same. Same eyes, sa..."
links.text: "We are all the same. Same eyes, same smiles, same death."

links.title: You: ""And what does it mean? Why is the..."
links.text: "And what does it mean? Why is the dead guy smiling?"

links.title: Noid: ""He defeated History. We are living..."
links.text: "He defeated History. We are living in the age of History, and in the eyes of History we are always already dead. How can we ever smile, then? Because History is a lie, and so are its deaths..."

links.title: Noid: ""The present moment and life are th..."
links.text: "The present moment and life are the hard core. The hard core expels death."

links.title: Noid: "He thinks. "Or maybe he's not dead,..."
links.text: He thinks. "Or maybe he's not dead, maybe he's just really ecstatic about the beats."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Or drugged out of his mind, come to..."
links.text: Or drugged out of his mind, come to think of it.

links.title: You: ""He could also be drugged out of hi..."
links.text: "He could also be drugged out of his mind."

links.title: Noid: ""Or drunk, or in a clinical coma, o..."
links.text: "Or drunk, or in a clinical coma, or glad to be dead, but those versions suck."

links.title: You: ""I'm thinking maybe the smiling dea..."
links.text: "I'm thinking maybe the smiling dead guy is a symbol for communism. It's also dead, but doesn't care."

links.title: Noid: "He considers this for a moment. "Ye..."
links.text: He considers this for a moment. "Yeah, that interpretation holds."

links.title: You: ""I'm thinking we should *sell* this.""
links.text: "I'm thinking we should *sell* this."

links.title: Noid: ""It should be sold," he nods, "but..."
links.text: "It should be sold," he nods, "but not by us."

links.title: You: "Better not mention it."
links.text: Better not mention it.

links.title: Noid: "He blinks, waiting for the next que..."
links.text: He blinks, waiting for the next question.

links.title: You: ""What makes the sticker so modern?""
links.text: "What makes the sticker so modern?"

links.title: Noid: ""Simplicity was brought to us by cl..."
links.text: "Simplicity was brought to us by classical Solaist modernism, but that was a *tasteful*, harmonious simplicity, right?"

links.title: Noid: ""Well, hard core is not tasteful or..."
links.text: "Well, hard core is not tasteful or outwardly harmonious. It's a warning shot: 'This will be dangerous.' The echo of man's loss, haunting him."

links.title: Noid: ""The sticker, the clothes, the musi..."
links.text: "The sticker, the clothes, the music -- same thing."

links.title: You: ""You come up with this stuff by you..."
links.text: "You come up with this stuff by yourself?"

links.title: Noid: ""Not alone. Many people are thinkin..."
links.text: "Not alone. Many people are thinking the same thing right now. There's a gathering at The Paliseum. The beat is the same for all."

links.title: You: ""Seems awesome." (Nod in agreaance...."
links.text: "Seems awesome." (Nod in agreaance.)

links.title: Noid: ""It is.""
links.text: "It is."

links.title: You: ""My head is spinning. It's hard to..."
links.text: "My head is spinning. It's hard to keep up with the times."

links.title: Noid: ""Yes. But that's what makes it an a..."
links.text: "Yes. But that's what makes it an achievement."

links.title: You: ""I think we've exhausted the subjec..."
links.text: "I think we've exhausted the subject for now."

links.title: Noid: ""I guess one could write an entire..."
links.text: "I guess one could write an entire treatise on the thing. But what for?"

links.title: You: ""Okay. It's a yellow circle -- the..."
links.text: "Okay. It's a yellow circle -- the human face -- with X-es for eyes and a smile underneath. I think the X-es mean the guy is dead."

links.title: Noid: ""Good, good." He likes what he's he..."
links.text: "Good, good." He likes what he's hearing. "What did you want to know?"

links.title: You: ""Tell me about the machines you saw..."
links.text: "Tell me about the machines you saw in the church."

links.title: Noid: "He cringes. "Weird stuff. Specializ..."
links.text: He cringes. "Weird stuff. Specialized. There was a data processor and some sort of long-wave machinery."

links.title: Noid: ""Wires going into water. Gives off..."
links.text: "Wires going into water. Gives off a spy sine, or some fucked up Samaran science sine... you know, the kind that goes head first into the supra-natural."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The People's Republic of Samara (SR..."
links.text: The People's Republic of Samara (SRV) is a product of Revachol's sister revolution on the isola of Graad. It's known as a severely degenerated rogue state.

links.title: You: ""Don't be too hard on Samara, they'..."
links.text: "Don't be too hard on Samara, they're all alone in the world. Half of what we know of them is just propaganda."

links.title: Noid: ""I know, man, I was just talking ab..."
links.text: "I know, man, I was just talking about the aesthetic."

links.title: You: ""What's wrong with the supra-natura..."
links.text: "What's wrong with the supra-natural?"

links.title: Noid: ""Nothing's wrong with it. It should..."
links.text: "Nothing's wrong with it. It should definitely be researched. You can still do sick shit with it, though."

links.title: Inland Empire: "The sickest. That is perhaps *why*..."
links.text: The sickest. That is perhaps *why* it should be researched.

links.title: You: ""The supra-natural... so you think..."
links.text: "The supra-natural... so you think it's real, that it actually exists?" (Proceed.)

links.title: Noid: ""Most of it doesn't exist, but ther..."
links.text: "Most of it doesn't exist, but there's also stuff that isn't *allowed* to exist because the moralists think it's too *dangerous* for the plebes."

links.title: Noid: ""Psionic powers, pale-related disea..."
links.text: "Psionic powers, pale-related diseases, *pretenders* pretending to be human, folk rites, that kind of stuff."

links.title: You: ""Why are you called 'Noid'?""
links.text: "Why are you called 'Noid'?"

links.title: Noid: ""The hard core aesthetic is esoteri..."
links.text: "The hard core aesthetic is esoteric. It is not meant to be discussed with the law at this moment." He picks up some sort of a widget.

links.title: Inland Empire: "It's not easy to reach a harmonic r..."
links.text: It's not easy to reach a harmonic resonance of sines without some adjustment.

links.title: Inland Empire: "It's not easy to reach a harmonic r..."
links.text: It's not easy to reach a harmonic resonance of sines without some adjustment.

links.title: You: ""Does this mean... we need sine mat..."
links.text: "Does this mean... we need sine matching?"

links.title: Noid: ""Yes, further sine-matching would d..."
links.text: "Yes, further sine-matching would do good for us. One way to achieve this would be by getting us into the church."

links.title: You: ""I don't understand what that means.""
links.text: "I don't understand what that means."

links.title: Noid: ""I can see that. Further sine-match..."
links.text: "I can see that. Further sine-matching would do good for us. One way to achieve sine-synchronicity would be by getting us into the *church*."

links.title: You: ""Could you use your *sine-sense* to..."
links.text: "Could you use your *sine-sense* to help me contact a Coalition warship?"

links.title: Noid: ""Don't think so. Big Bad frequencie..."
links.text: "Don't think so. Big Bad frequencies are extremely negative: thought suppression, dream implantation, memory revision. Pretty *out there* stuff, not sure I want to get involved with it."

links.title: Empathy: "There is fear there, but also curio..."
links.text: There is fear there, but also curiosity. He just needs a *reason* to help you.

links.title: Noid: ""Besides, our own sines aren't even..."
links.text: "Besides, our own sines aren't even synced yet. So how am I supposed to get *you* synced up with the Big Bad? It doesn't make any sense, law-lover."

links.title: You: ""Okay, maybe I'll come back later...."
links.text: "Okay, maybe I'll come back later. [Leave.]

links.title: Empathy: "This young speedfreak seems to know..."
links.text: This young speedfreak seems to know a lot about 'sines'... could he be the techno-tinkerer you're looking for?

links.title: Noid: "His look is intensely suspicious."
links.text: His look is intensely suspicious.

links.title: Empathy: "This young speedfreak seems to know..."
links.text: This young speedfreak seems to know a lot about 'sines'... could he have the technical skill you're looking for?

dialogueTree.title: Noid: ""So you had a talk with Andre, and..."
dialogueTree.text: "So you had a talk with Andre, and now you want to discuss things with Noid?" He's stooped over his toolbox as usual, shuffling bolts around angrily.

links.title: Noid: ""That's fine, man. But I've gotta w..."
links.text: "That's fine, man. But I've gotta warn you -- our sines are still off. It will take some time for me to get my psi on."

dialogueTree.title: Noid: ""So you had a talk with Andre, and..."
dialogueTree.text: "So you had a talk with Andre, and now you want to discuss things with Noid? Good." Skin shows through the holes in the speedfreak's too-large sweater. In front of him -- an open toolbox full of carpentry tools and parts.

links.title: Noid: ""It's good you talked to Andre firs..."
links.text: "It's good you talked to Andre first. Gave me time to get a reading on your *sine*. Can't really talk to people before you get a reading." He runs his hand through his hair, which is combed back in mock seriousness, and continues to fiddle with some gears.

dialogueTree.title: Noid: "Noid shakes to the beat. There are..."
dialogueTree.text: Noid shakes to the beat. There are no tools in his hands at the moment. He appears to ignore you.

dialogueTree.title: Noid: ""Go speak to Andre. I'm just the No..."
dialogueTree.text: "Go speak to Andre. I'm just the Noid," a strangely dressed young man says without looking up from his toolbox.

links.title: You: ""What if I want to speak to you fir..."
links.text: "What if I want to speak to you first?"

links.title: Noid: ""I suck at socializing, man. If you..."
links.text: "I suck at socializing, man. If you go speak to Andre, I'll have time to *tune in*. Get a reading on your *sine*." Before he's finished talking, he's already turned back to his tools.

links.title: Suggestion: "Maybe you should just stand there,..."
links.text: Maybe you should just stand there, watch him rattle his toolbox. Get to know *his* 'sine.'

links.title: Empathy: "This young speedfreak seems to know..."
links.text: This young speedfreak seems to know a lot about 'sines'... could he be the techno-tinkerer you're looking for?

links.title: Empathy: "This young speedfreak seems to know..."
links.text: This young speedfreak seems to know a lot about 'sines'... could he have the technical skill you're looking for?

links.title: You: "Just stand there and observe him."
links.text: Just stand there and observe him.

links.title: Noid: "The contents of the young man's too..."
links.text: The contents of the young man's toolbox are organized in a neat, yet eclectic manner. He is constantly checking out the various tools and parts and rearranging them slightly...

links.title: Noid: "It's a bit hypnotizing if you look..."
links.text: It's a bit hypnotizing if you look at it long enough.

links.title: Noid: ""I have all kinds of screws." He ho..."
links.text: "I have all kinds of screws." He holds up a handful.

links.title: You: "Nod."
links.text: Nod.

links.title: Noid: ""They'll come in handy for fixing t..."
links.text: "They'll come in handy for fixing the church exterior."

links.title: Noid: ""Talk to Andre. No point in standin..."
links.text: "Talk to Andre. No point in standing here -- the sines are really out of tune." He glances at the others.

links.title: You: ""You have a whole lot of stuff.""
links.text: "You have a whole lot of stuff."

links.title: Noid: ""I'd have a whole lot more stuff if..."
links.text: "I'd have a whole lot more stuff if I had a place where I could keep that stuff."

links.title: You: ""What do you do with all that stuff?""
links.text: "What do you do with all that stuff?"

links.title: Noid: ""These are my consumer items and my..."
links.text: "These are my consumer items and my means of production. I enjoy them."

links.title: You: ""That's ridiculous.""
links.text: "That's ridiculous."

links.title: Noid: ""See? It's already going wrong. Sin..."
links.text: "See? It's already going wrong. Sine is off." The young man picks up a thin metal saw blade and examines it.

links.title: Half Light: "Scared? Angry? It's hard to say whi..."
links.text: Scared? Angry? It's hard to say which this man is.

links.title: Empathy: "He's just scared."
links.text: He's just scared.

links.title: You: ""Alright, I'll do that.""
links.text: "Alright, I'll do that."

links.title: Noid: "The young man picks up a thin metal..."
links.text: The young man picks up a thin metal saw blade and nods.

links.title: You: ""Okay, I'll speak to Andre." [Leave..."
links.text: "Okay, I'll speak to Andre." [Leave.]
